{
Synthetic Prices
© 2013 John F. Ehlers
}
Inputs:
	alpha1(.05);

Vars:
	Opn(0),
	Hgh(0),
	Lw(0),
	Cls(0);

Cls = alpha1*(45 + Random(10)) + (1 - alpha1)*Cls[1];
Hgh = Cls + Random(.125);
Lw = Cls - Random(.125);
Opn = Cls + (Random(.25) - .125);
If Opn > Hgh Then Opn = Hgh;
If Opn < Lw Then Opn = Lw;
//Format Low and High as Histograms
//Format Open and Close as Points
Plot1(Opn, "O", Blue, 0, 3);
Plot2(Lw, "L", White, 0, 2);
Plot3(Hgh, "H", Blue, 0, 2);
Plot4(Cls, "C", Blue, 0, 3);
